structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Definitions for KRS 216B.300 to 216B.320 and KRS 216B.990(5).
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 33, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 507, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 451, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 439, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
